channel.title: CVE Feed for e-Excellence -- U-Office Force
channel.description: The latest CVEs for e-Excellence -- U-Office Force

item.title: CVE-2023-32756|2023-08-25T07:14:39.112Z -- e-excellence -- u-office%20force
item.description: e-Excellence U-Office Force has a path traversal vulnerability within its file uploading and downloading functions. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to read arbitrary system files, but canâ€™t control system or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-32757|2023-08-25T07:29:05.292Z -- e-excellence -- u-office%20force
item.description: e-Excellence U-Office Force file uploading function does not restrict upload of file with dangerous type. An unauthenticated remote attacker without logging the service can exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary files to perform arbitrary command or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-32755|2023-08-25T07:14:01.725Z -- e-excellence -- u-office%20force
item.description: e-Excellence U-Office Force generates an error message in webiste service. An unauthenticated remote attacker can obtain partial sensitive system information from error message by sending a crafted command.
